question: Tenth Global Forum for Food and Agriculture held at __________.
explanation: The 10th edition of Global Forum for Food & Agriculture was held in Berlin, Germany from 18th -20th January 2018. The theme of this year's event is "Shaping the future of livestock - sustainably, responsibly, efficiently". The Indian delegation to the event is led by Union Minister of State (MoS) for Agriculture & Farmers Welfare Gajendra Singh Shekhawat.
